Players.summary: Manages players joining/leaving and Player objects.
notes: Tip: LocalPlayer is client-only (nil on server); use PlayerAdded/Removing on server.

ReplicatedStorage.summary: Shared storage replicated to clients. Shared modules/remotes live here.
notes: Tip: Put RemoteEvent/RemoteFunction and shared ModuleScripts here; never store secrets (use ServerStorage).
Tip: Place secrets/server-only modules here; never expose to clients.

StarterGui.summary: Starter UI templates replicated to PlayerGui.
notes: Tip: Use ResetOnSpawn=false for persistent UIs; avoid heavy logic in StarterGui scripts.
Tip: Put LocalScripts in StarterPlayerScripts; ServerScripts belong in ServerScriptService.
Tip: Prefer events over tight while loops; keep per-frame work light.
Tip: Check path.Status; handle Blocked and recompute as needed.
Tip: Make writes idempotent and respect budgets; batch updates and use UpdateAsync.

HttpService.summary: HTTP requests (if enabled) and JSON utilities.
notes: Tip: Always filter/validate remote responses; respect request limits and timeouts.
Tip: Debounce/coalesce publishes; handle retries and rate limits gracefully.

CollectionService.summary: Tag instances and query by tags.
notes: Tip: Keep tags stable; avoid tight polling—use signals or periodic refresh.
Tip: For unified actions use ContextActionService; UIS is client-only.

ContextActionService.summary: Bind inputs to named actions across devices.
notes: Tip: Always UnbindAction when leaving a state to avoid leaks.

TweenService.summary: Create and play Tweens on instances.
notes: Tip: Only tween tweenable properties; limit simultaneous tweens to avoid hitches.
Tip: ProcessReceipt must be idempotent and return PurchaseGranted; store processed receipts.
Tip: Changing many properties per frame can hitch; tween a few key values.
Tip: Use PlayLocalSound for client-only feedback; manage volumes centrally.
Tip: Keep Preload/intro scripts fast; transition promptly to experience UI.
Tip: Use AddItem instead of manual delays for predictable cleanup.
Tip: Define collision groups once and reuse; avoid per-frame group changes.
Tip: Check UserHasBadgeAsync before AwardBadge; handle errors and retries.
Tip: Always filter UGC text before display; cache FilterStringAsync results when safe.
Tip: Use localization tables for strings; avoid hard-coded text.
Tip: Query once and cache per session; feature-flag content by policy.
Tip: Use TeleportAsync with options; handle errors and retry with backoff.

Teams.summary: Manage player teams and team-based rules.
notes: Tip: Update team membership server-side and reflect UI on clients.

StarterPack.summary: Tools replicated to players on spawn.
notes: Tip: Use for tool defaults only; manage runtime tool giving from server.

Instance.summary: Base class of all Roblox objects.
notes: Prefer :FindFirstChild / :WaitForChild over deep indexing that may be nil
Avoid heavy reparenting in tight loops
Move the Model (PivotTo/MoveTo) rather than setting HumanoidRootPart directly when possible
Debounce .Touched handlers; they can fire often
Restore CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom after custom cams
TextScaled can be expensive at large sizes
Use AnchorPoint + Position for predictable layout

Folder.summary: Lightweight container with no properties affecting rendering.
notes: Safe for replication; no rendering cost
Use MaxDistance to limit render range

SurfaceGui.summary: GUI rendered on a face of a 3D object.

notes: Use ExclusionGroups to prevent overlap spam

Beam.summary: Renders a beam between two attachments.

ParticleEmitter.summary: Emits particles from a part or attachment.
notes: Tune Rate and Lifetime for performance
Prefer atlases; avoid too many emitters

UIScale.summary: Scale all descendants of a UI object.

notes: Use Promise.all to run in parallel

ImageLabel.summary: UI element that displays an image.

UICorner.summary: Rounds the corners of UI elements.
notes: CornerRadius is a UDim e.g. UDim.new(0,8)

UIAspectRatioConstraint.summary: Locks aspect ratio of a UI element.

UIGradient.summary: Applies a color gradient to a UI element.

Attachment.summary: Reference frame attached to an instance.

notes: Use Attachment0/1 or center of mass

LinearVelocity.summary: Applies linear velocity to an assembly.

Animator.summary: Handles playing animations on a rig.

Tween.summary: Object returned by TweenService:Create to control playback.

Team.summary: Group of players with shared rules/colors.

TweenInfo.summary: Tween configuration (time, style, direction, repeat, reverses, delay).
TweenInfo.usage: TweenInfo.new(time, Enum.EasingStyle.Quad, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, repeatCount, reverses, delayTime)

UnitRay.summary: Ray with unit-length direction from an origin.

IsA.summary: Check if instance is a given class.

typeof.summary: Return Luau type of a value.

pairs.usage: for k,v in pairs(t) do ... end

ipairs.usage: for i,v in ipairs(t) do ... end

gmatch.usage: for a in string.gmatch(s, pat) do ... end

string.split.summary: Split string by separator into table.

table.find.summary: Find value in array, return index or nil.

task.delay.summary: Call a function after a delay.

task.defer.summary: Schedule function to run after current task.

new.summary: Constructor suffix used by many types (e.g., TweenInfo.new).
new.usage: TweenInfo.new(time, style, dir, repeatCount, reverses, delay)

player.summary: Variable commonly used for Player in callbacks.

profile.summary: ProfileService profile table for a player (library-specific).

PurchaseEvent.summary: Typical RemoteEvent name used for purchase callbacks in ReplicatedStorage.

require.summary: Load a ModuleScript and return its result.

input.summary: Variable commonly used for UserInputService callbacks.

if.usage: if cond then ... elseif cond2 then ... else ... end

then.summary: Begins the 'then' block of an if.

elseif.usage: if a then ... elseif b then ... end

for.usage: for i=1,10 do ... end | for k,v in pairs(t) do ... end

break.usage: for i=1,10 do if cond then break end end

continue.usage: for i=1,10 do if cond then continue end end

and.usage: if a and b then ... end

any.summary: Luau top type (disables checking for that value).

success.summary: Conventional variable name for operation result (non-engine).

message.summary: Conventional variable name for text detail (non-engine).

:.usage: obj:Method(x) -- passes obj as first arg

--!strict.summary: Luau file directive for strict type checking.

--!nonstrict.summary: Luau file directive for non-strict mode.

LocalPlayer.summary: The local player's Player instance (client only).

PlayerAdded.summary: Event fires when a player joins.

PlayerRemoving.summary: Event fires when a player leaves.

GetPlayerFromCharacter.summary: Find player owning a character model.

GetPlayerByUserId.summary: Find player by userId (if in server).

Kick.summary: Kick a player from the server.

CurrentCamera.summary: Active Camera for the local client.

Raycast.summary: Raycast into the world with parameters.

ChildAdded.summary: Event when a child is added.

FireClient.summary: Server to one client fire (no return).

IsDescendantOf.summary: True if this instance is under the given ancestor.

Create.summary: Create a Tween for an instance with goals.
Create.usage: local t = TweenService:Create(inst, TweenInfo.new(0.5, Enum.EasingStyle.Sine, Enum.EasingDirection.Out), {Transparency = 1})

ProcessReceipt.summary: Callback to process developer product receipts.

PromptProductPurchase.summary: Prompt a player to purchase a developer product.

Touched.summary: Event when another part touches this part.

TouchEnded.summary: Event when a touching part stops touching.

IsKeyDown.summary: Check if a key is held.

RichText.summary: Enable rich text tags in Text.

HoldDuration.summary: Hold time in seconds before trigger.
